item.title: I-40 East - Exit 175
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 175 - NM-14/NM-333/NM-337/Tijeras/Cedar Crest. Use NM-14 for the Turquoise Trail National Scenic Byway and the Sandia Crest Ski Area.

item.title: NM-14 North at I-25
item.description: NM-14 north at I-25. Merge right for I-25 north to Las Vegas. Continue north on NM-14 for Santa Fe.

item.title: NM-14 North at NM-599
item.description: NM-14 north at NM-599. Use NM-599 for I-25. Northbound I-25 traffic can continue north on NM-14, although NM-599 is a shortcut to the freeway. This is the southern end of the Santa Fe Relief Route.

item.title: NM-14 North at NM-344
item.description: NM-14 north at NM-344. The arrows are missing from these signs. Turn right for NM-344 south; straight for NM-14 north.

item.title: NM-14 North Approaching NM-344
item.description: NM-14 North approaching NM-344 along the Turquoise Trail.

item.title: NM-14 North at NM-306/NM-536
item.description: NM-14 north at NM-536 west to Sandia Crest Ski Area. Turn right for NM-306, Frost Road. Entering the community of San Antonito.

item.title: NM-14 North - National Scenic Byway
item.description: NM-14 north National Scenic Byway and New Mexico Scenic Byway sign. This is the start of the Turquoise Trail.

item.title: NM-14 at NM-333/NM-337
item.description: NM-14/NM-333/NM-337 junction. Use left lane for NM-14 North/Cedar Crest/East Tijeras.

item.title: I-40 East Exit 175 Offramp
item.description: I-40 East Exit 175 offramp. Use left lane for NM-14 north to Cedar Crest. Use right lane for NM-337/NM-333 to Tijeras.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 175
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 175 - NM-14/NM-333/NM-337/Tijeras/Cedar Crest. Use NM-14 for the Turquoise Trail National Scenic Byway and the Sandia Crest Ski Area.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 278A
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 278A - NM-14 South/Madrid.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South At NM-14
item.description: US-84/US-285 South (St. Francis Drive) At NM-14 (Cerrillos Road). Use St. Francis Drive south for I-25.
